name: Eternal Dread
description: Welcome to the unforgiving world ruled by the four Elder Fiends. Mankind as a whole is facing an unprecedented crisis that could lead to their total extinction. Having exhausted brave men in a war against the fiends, they now have no choice but to recruit the help of women to fight for their losing cause.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7(64bit) 处理器: 1.8 GHz Dual core 内存: 8 GB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 210 (or equivalent) 存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 7(64bit) 处理器: 2.5 GHz Dual core 内存: 8 GB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650(or equivalent) 存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间
